costCalculator.disclaimer: Estimates based on industry averages. Adjust assumptions to match your situation.

q1.question: How much do professional headshots cost per person?
q1.answer: Traditional professional headshots typically cost $150-400 per person, including photographer fees, session time, and retouching. With TeamShotsPro AI headshots, the cost starts at $29 per person for teams, with volume discounts available for larger groups.

q2.question: What are the hidden costs of traditional corporate photography?
q2.answer: Hidden costs include: employee time away from work ($50+/hour × 30-60 minutes per person), administrative coordination (4+ hours of scheduling), retouching fees ($35+ per person), usage rights fees, and travel expenses. These can easily double the quoted photographer rate.

q3.question: How much can teams save with AI headshots?
q3.answer: Teams typically save 70-85% compared to traditional photography. For a 25-person team, traditional photography costs around $6,000-8,000 when including all hidden costs, while AI headshots cost approximately $500-700 total.

q4.question: Do AI headshots include commercial usage rights?
q4.answer: Yes, TeamShotsPro includes full commercial usage rights with every plan at no extra cost. Traditional photographers often charge $350+ extra for commercial usage rights and travel fees.

q5.question: How long does it take to get AI headshots?
q5.answer: AI headshots are generated in approximately 60 seconds after uploading a selfie. Traditional photography requires scheduling (often weeks in advance), the session itself (30-60 minutes), and waiting for retouched photos (1-2 weeks).

trust.title: Why teams choose TeamShotsPro over everyone else
trust.subtitle: Built for serious B2B teams that need enterprise-grade photo management, not consumer gimmicks

noModelTraining.title: No model training - just quality results
noModelTraining.description: Other AI tools train a model on your face, then generate 40 random images hoping one looks good. We generate each headshot uniquely with real-time quality control. That's why your team looks like themselves, not like AI artifacts.

teamCommandCenter.title: Team Command Center - Built for managers who hate chaos
teamCommandCenter.description: Central dashboard where you control everything: approve photos, invite team members with one click, track progress, and manage brand consistency across your entire organization. Unlike consumer tools, this was built specifically for teams.

industryTemplates.title: Professional templates designed for your industry
industryTemplates.description: Pre-built style templates for tech startups, consulting firms, creative agencies, healthcare, finance, and more. Each template understands the professional standards for your industry - from conservative banking styles to creative agency vibes. Not generic filters.

qualityControl.title: Quality guaranteed with automatic fixes
qualityControl.description: Photos that fail our quality standards get regenerated automatically. Plus you get plan-based free retries to perfect your results. Unlike other services where you pay for every attempt, we handle quality issues automatically and give you free iterations to get exactly what you want.

howItWorks.title: Four steps to a unified team look
howItWorks.subtitle: You set an on-brand style once (e.g. background, logo), and you invite your team members. That's it. Your team members will get an invite and can generate their own photos, frictionless without registration. You see all the photos in the admin panel and select the best one.
howItWorks.guarantee: Risk-free: Try it free with your team to see the quality. No credit card, no commitment.
howItWorks.freePhotosLine: 3 free test photos with TeamShots watermark — paid plans are watermark-free
howItWorks.noCreditCardLine: No credit card required for test photos

1.title: Set Your Brand Identity
1.description: Backgrounds, logo, clothing style. You decide what's fixed and what team members can change (e.g. expression, or clothing colors).

2.title: Invite Your Team
2.description: Invite one-by-one or upload a CSV from BambooHR, Workday, Gusto, or any spreadsheet. They get a magic link. No scheduling grids, no calendar Tetris. Track progress in your dashboard.

3.title: They Upload a Selfie
3.description: Team members snap a quick selfie from their phone. We transform it into your brand style instantly.

4.title: Get Your Assets
4.description: Review and download a unified gallery of professional headshots. Consistent, high-res, and ready for your website.

guarantee.title: Studio-Quality Guarantee
guarantee.subtitle: Not satisfied? We regenerate for free. No questions asked.
guarantee.description: Every headshot goes through automated quality checks before delivery. If any photo doesn't meet your standards, we'll regenerate it at no extra cost. Studio-quality results that look like you, just more polished.
